item.title: 黄金因经济和地缘政治风险而稳定在历史高位附近
item.description: 黄金在亚市早盘企稳，在上一交易日连续刷新历史新高之后，经济和地缘政治风险上升支撑了避险需求。【原文：Gold steadied in early Asian trading — after blowing through a series of record highs in the previous session — with rising economic and geopolitical risks supporting haven demand.】

item.title: 红杉资本常青基金规模增至近 200 亿美元
item.description: 根据美国证券交易委员会的一份文件，红杉资本（Sequoia Capital）的常青基金已增至 196 亿美元，这表明，尽管风险投资融资放缓，这家著名公司仍在继续增长。【原文：Sequoia Capital’s evergreen fund has grown to $19.6 billion, according to a US Securities and Exchange Commission filing, a signal that the prestigious firm continues to grow despite a venture capital funding slowdown.】

item.title: 货币交易商回避美元，日元重获青睐
item.description: 货币市场疯狂的一周让对冲基金放弃了美元交易，转而关注日元。【原文：A wild week in the currency markets has left hedge funds heading for the exits on their dollar trades and turning their attention toward the Japanese yen.】

item.title: 野村利润攀升至四年新高后股价大涨
item.description: 野村控股公司（Nomura Holdings Inc.【原文：Nomura Holdings Inc.’s shares jumped the most in three months after Japan’s biggest brokerage posted third-quarter earnings that beat estimates on robust trading and cost cuts.】

item.title: 英国陷入滞胀，英格兰银行将第三次降息
item.description: 英国央行预计将于周四第三次降息，同时下调英国经济增长预期，并预测今年的通胀率将上升，这份报告将让英国财政大臣雷切尔-里夫斯（Rachel Reeves）读起来很不舒服。【原文：The Bank of England is expected to cut interest rates for a third time on Thursday while downgrading its UK growth forecasts and predicting higher inflation this year in a report that will make uncomfortable reading for Chancellor of the Exchequer Rachel Reeves.】

item.title: 摩根大通发现：关税将推动全球市场进入动荡的 2025 年
item.description: 摩根大通银行（JPMorgan Chase & Co.）的电子交易调查显示，本周由美国一系列关税声明引发的全球金融市场动荡似乎只是今年动荡的开始。【原文：Global financial-market turbulence this week sparked by a series of US tariff announcements looks like just the beginning of a volatile year, according to a JPMorgan Chase & Co. electronic trading survey.】

item.title: 世界通胀有可能因特朗普的贸易战而死灰复燃
item.description: 唐纳德-特朗普总统越是威胁要对美国的贸易伙伴征收关税，全球经济学家就越是担心会出现另一波通货膨胀。【原文：The more President Donald Trump threatens tariffs on the US’s trading partners, the more the worry of another inflation wave troubles global economists.】

item.title: 特朗普影响市场情绪，石油价格接近今年最低点
item.description: 由于唐纳德-特朗普总统的地缘政治立场和对能源征收关税的威胁影响了石油前景，石油价格在今年最低点附近企稳。【原文：Oil steadied near the lowest this year as President Donald Trump’s geopolitical positions and threats of tariffs on energy weighed on the outlook.】

item.title: 印度新任印度央行行长将开始降息
item.description: 印度新任央行行长预计将在其首次政策会议上宣布降息，在全球风险升级之际将重点转向促进经济增长。【原文：India’s new central bank governor is expected to deliver an interest rate cut in his first policy meeting, shifting the focus to boosting economic growth as global risks escalate.】

item.title: 亚洲股市上涨，华尔街延续涨势：市场综述
item.description: 在关税、科技公司业绩不佳和美国经济数据参差不齐的一周里，华尔街股市和债券上涨，亚洲股市周四将上扬。【原文：Asian equities were set to advance Thursday after stocks and bonds rose on Wall Street in a week marred by tariffs, lackluster tech earnings and uneven US economic data.】

item.title: 名人支持的初创公司 Function Health 寻求 20 亿美元估值
item.description:
由作家和小肯尼迪的盟友马克-海曼博士共同创办的Function公司销售一套价值499美元的长寿实验室测试工具。【原文：

Co-founded by author and RFK Jr. ally Dr. Mark Hyman, Function sells a $499 package of lab tests for longevity.

】

item.title: 私人信贷蓬勃发展，Pimco却落在后面
item.description:
与竞争对手相比，这家基金巨头在进入私人市场淘金热的过程中显得更加谨慎。有被甩在后面的危险。【原文：

The fund giant’s dive into the private-markets gold rush has been much more tentative than rivals. There’s a danger of getting left behind. 

】

item.title: DeepSeek 竞争对手争夺中国下一个人工智能冠军
item.description: 下一个颠覆全球人工智能产业的 DeepSeek 也可能来自中国。【原文：The next DeepSeek to disrupt the global artificial intelligence industry could also come from China.】

item.title: 美国将宣布扣押委内瑞拉副总统的飞机
item.description: 特朗普政府将宣布正式扣押一架委内瑞拉政府的飞机，该飞机自去年以来一直被扣押在多米尼加共和国，此举可能会使驱逐出境方面的合作变得更加复杂。【原文：The Trump administration is set to announce it has formally seized a Venezuelan government plane that’s been held in the Dominican Republic since last year, a move that may complicate efforts to cooperate on deportations.】

item.title: Sonos 裁员 12% 以改进产品组织结构
item.description: Sonos 公司表示，该公司将裁员约 12%，即 200 人，目的是使其产品团队 "更扁平、更小巧、更专注"。【原文：Sonos Inc. said it’s cutting about 12% of its staff, or 200 workers, in a bid to make its product teams “flatter, smaller and more focused.”】

item.title: 特朗普时代，谷歌终止员工多元化目标
item.description: Alphabet Inc. 旗下的谷歌公司（Google）告诉员工，该公司将不再正式寻求提高员工队伍的多样性，这标志着硅谷从美国总统唐纳德-特朗普执政期间失宠的举措中撤退的最新一步。【原文：Alphabet Inc.’s Google told employees that it will no longer formally seek to improve the diversity of its workforce, marking the latest step in Silicon Valley’s retreat from initiatives that have fallen out of favor during US President Donald Trump’s administration.】

item.title: 美联储发布华尔街银行压力测试计划
item.description: 美联储公布了其年度压力测试的假设情景，该测试旨在评估大银行的应变能力，确保它们即使在严重衰退的情况下也能继续放贷。【原文：The Federal Reserve released hypothetical scenarios for its annual stress tests, which seek to evaluate the resilience of big banks and ensure they can keep lending even in a severe recession.】

item.title: 贝森特称他和特朗普关注 10 年期收益率，而非推动美联储
item.description: 财政部长斯科特-贝森特（Scott Bessent）表示，特朗普政府降低借贷成本的重点是 10 年期国债收益率，而不是美联储的基准短期利率。【原文：Treasury Secretary Scott Bessent said the Trump administration’s focus with regard to bringing down borrowing costs is 10-year Treasury yields, rather than the Federal Reserve’s benchmark short-term interest rate.】

item.title: Ategrity Specialty Insurance 借助摩根大通和巴克莱银行进行美国 IPO
item.description: 据知情人士透露，为美国中小型公司提供超额和剩余保险的 Ategrity Specialty Insurance Co.【原文：Ategrity Specialty Insurance Co., a provider of excess and surplus insurance to small and midsize US companies, is exploring an initial public offering that could occur as soon as this year, according to people with knowledge of the matter.】

item.title: 迈克尔-赛勒的战略在会计变更生效前又出现了亏损

item.title: Arm 预测不乐观，引发人工智能发展放缓的担忧
item.description: Arm Holdings Plc 公司对本期收入预测持谨慎态度，这加剧了近期人们对人工智能计算支出放缓的担忧。【原文：Arm Holdings Plc gave a cautious revenue forecast for the current period, adding to recent concern that spending on artificial intelligence computing is slowing.】

item.title: 高通公司预计智能手机销售收入将强劲增长
item.description: 全球最大的智能手机处理器销售商高通公司（Qualcomm Inc.【原文：Qualcomm Inc., the world’s biggest seller of smartphone processors, gave a sales forecast for the current quarter that topped estimates, indicating demand for high-end handsets remains strong and the company is making progress in new markets.】

item.title: 普利兹克警告伊利诺伊州的联邦工作人员不要被马斯克收购
item.description: 伊利诺伊州州长 JB-普利兹克（JB Pritzker）警告该州的联邦雇员，唐纳德-特朗普总统及其顾问埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）为缩减美国政府的劳动力而提出的买断计划存在风险。【原文：Illinois Governor JB Pritzker is warning federal employees in his state about risks related to the buyouts President Donald Trump and his advisor Elon Musk are offering to shrink the US government’s workforce.】

item.title: 软银即将达成收购芯片设计公司 Ampere 的交易
item.description: 据知情人士透露，软银集团公司（SoftBank Group Corp.【原文：SoftBank Group Corp. is in advanced talks to acquire Ampere Computing LLC, people familiar with the matter said.】

item.title: 美联储主席古尔斯比警告不要忽视关税对通胀的影响
item.description: 芝加哥联邦储备银行行长古尔斯比（Austan Goolsbee）表示，持续、超额的关税可能会再次扰乱供应链，并推高通胀。【原文：Federal Reserve Bank of Chicago President Austan Goolsbee said persistent, outsize tariffs could renew supply-chain disruptions and drive up inflation.】

item.title: 美国联邦存款保险公司（FDIC）发布文件，调查银行的加密货币业务计划
item.description: 美国联邦存款保险公司（Federal Deposit Insurance Corp.【原文：The Federal Deposit Insurance Corp. released a trove of documents related to its supervision of US banks that were providing services to the cryptocurrency industry or considering doing so, providing a glimpse into some of the regulator’s oversight priorities over the past few years.】

item.title: 吉姆-查诺斯称市场最大的风险是类似 "深度观察 "的事件
item.description: 传奇做空者吉姆-查诺斯（Jim Chanos）说，没有人能看到美国市场在未来 6 到 12 个月内面临的最大风险，因为这些挑战将是不可预知的事件，比如上个月 DeepSeek 的倒闭就抹去了美股约 1 万亿美元的市值。【原文：Legendary short seller Jim Chanos says no one can see the biggest risks facing US markets over the next six to 12 months — because the challenges are going to be unpredictable events, like last month’s DeepSeek collapse that wiped out roughly $1 trillion in market value from US stocks.】

item.title: Pimco 的伊瓦辛拥抱特朗普驱动的债券市场波动
item.description: 太平洋投资管理公司的首席投资官表示，债券交易员无法预测美国总统唐纳德-特朗普接下来会做什么，但可以利用这种不确定性来创造丰厚的回报。【原文：Bond traders can’t predict what US President Donald Trump will do next, but that uncertainty can be exploited to generate strong returns, according to Pacific Investment Management Co.’s chief investment officer.】

item.title: 微策略公司在财报发布前将公司名称改为策略公司

item.title: 关税动荡下金商大幅折价出售京东方金条
item.description: 由于对特朗普可能征收关税的担忧引发了对金银的争夺，导致提取黄金的队伍排了数周之久，因此英格兰银行金库中的黄金交易价格较市场价格有所折让。【原文：Gold in the Bank of England vault is trading at a discount to the wider market, as fears over potential Trump tariffs spark a scramble for bullion that’s resulting in weeks-long queues to withdraw metal.】
